'''Sweet Madame''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Sweet Madame is available from the start of the game.<!--10 normal variants are given in the beginning after you kill the slimes. Would be nice to translate this into a blob.-->

Depending on the quality, Sweet Madame restores '''20'''/'''22'''/'''24'''% of Max HP and an additional '''900'''/'''1,200'''/'''1,500''' HP to the target character. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Rosaria|Dinner of Judgment}}

==Trivia==
* The dish is referenced as "Sweetened Mistress" by [[Mr. Zhu]], who misremembered the name, in the {{Quest|Old Tastes Die Hard}}.
* Many Mondstadters believe that an "authentic" Sweet Madame is cooked using pigeon meat, but this is not true.<ref>{{Ref/Furnishing|White Pigeon}}</ref>
* The [[Teyvat Food Notes]] released a [https://ys.mihoyo.com/main/news/detail/13400 real-life recipe] for Sweet Madame.
* It is [[Fischl]]'s least favorite food.<ref>{{Ref/VO|Fischl|Least Favorite Food}}</ref>
* It is one of [[Bennett]]'s favorite foods.<ref>{{Ref/VO|Bennett|Favorite Food}}</ref>
* {{Related Items|type=variant}}
